events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their vehicle with another car at an intersection on April 30th.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident due to the presence of keywords related to the car collision.
An agent specialized in auto accidents was assigned to handle the case to ensure personalized assistance for the vehicle owner.
Acknowledgment of the claim filing was sent to the customer with details about the process and next steps.
The agent requested additional documents including photos of the vehicle damage and the police report of the accident.
Customer submitted requested documents, including photographs and a copy of the police accident report as per instructions.
Investigation commenced to verify details of the collision, assessing fault and damage extent reported in the documents.
Investigation findings were completed, confirming the client's vehicle was rear-ended at the traffic light intersection.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the vehicle repairs and additional expenses incurred due to the accident.
The customer responded to the settlement offer requesting clarification on several components of the payment breakdown.
Due to the customer's concerns, the claim was escalated to a senior claims handler for further review and adjustment.
After review, the claim was approved with a revised settlement amount addressing all customer concerns satisfactorily.
The settlement payment was processed and issued to the customerâ€™s account promptly as per the approved amount.
The claim was closed successfully after confirming that the customer received payment and was satisfied with the resolution.
All case files and correspondence were archived in the system for record keeping and future reference if necessary.
